View Javadoc
1   package com.jsql.model.injection.vendor.model;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.bean.database.Database;
5   import com.jsql.model.bean.database.Table;
6   import com.jsql.model.injection.strategy.blind.AbstractInjectionBinary.BinaryMode;
7   import com.jsql.model.injection.vendor.model.yaml.Method;
8   import com.jsql.model.injection.vendor.model.yaml.ModelYaml;
9   import com.jsql.util.LogLevelUtil;
10  import com.jsql.util.StringUtil;
11  import org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex;
12  import org.apache.commons.lang3.RandomStringUtils;
13  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
14  import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
15  import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
16  import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
17  
18  import java.net.URLEncoder;
19  import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
20  import java.util.ArrayList;
21  import java.util.Collections;
22  import java.util.List;
23  import java.util.regex.Pattern;

25  import static com.jsql.model.accessible.DataAccess.*;
26  
27  public class VendorYaml implements AbstractVendor {
28      
29      /**
30       * Log4j logger sent to view.
31       */
32      private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getRootLogger();
33  
34      /**
35       * SQL characters marking the end of the result of an injection.
36       * Process stops when this schema is encountered:
37       * <pre>SqLix01x03x03x07
38       */
39      public static final String LEAD_HEX = "0x53714c69";
40      public static final String LEAD_PIPE = "Sq'||'Li";
41      public static final String TRAIL_SQL = "%01%03%03%07";
42      public static final String TRAIL_HEX = "0x01030307";
43  
44      /**
45       * SQL character used between each table cells.
46       * Expected schema of multiple table cells :
47       * <pre>
48       * %04[table cell]%05[number of occurrences]%04%06%04[table cell]%05[number of occurrences]%04
49       */
50      public static final String SEPARATOR_CELL_SQL = "%06";
51      public static final String SEPARATOR_CELL_HEX = "0x06";
52  
53      public static final String ENCLOSE_VALUE_HEX = "0x04";
54  
55      /**
56       * SQL character used between the table cell and the number of occurrence of the cell text.
57       * Expected schema of a table cell data is
58       * <pre>%04[table cell]%05[number of occurrences]%04
59       */
60      public static final String SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL = "%05";
61      public static final String SEPARATOR_QTE_HEX = "0x05";
62  
63      /**
64       * SQL character enclosing a table cell returned by injection.
65       * It allows to detect the correct end of a table cell data during parsing.
66       * Expected schema of a table cell data is
67       * <pre>%04[table cell]%05[number of occurrences]%04
68       */
69      public static final String ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL = "%04";
70  
71      public static final String CALIBRATOR_SQL = "%23";
72      public static final String CALIBRATOR_HEX = "0x23";
73      
74      public static final String FORMAT_INDEX = "1337%s7331";
75  
76      private static final String BINARY_MODE = "${binary.mode}";
77  
78      public static final String LIMIT = "${limit}";
79      private static final String LIMIT_VALUE = "${limit.value}";
80  
81      private static final String RESULT_RANGE = "${result_range}";
82  
83      private static final String INDICE_UNIQUE = "${indice_unique}";
84  
85      private static final String CALIBRATOR = "${calibrator}";
86  
87      private static final String INDICES = "${indices}";
88      public static final String INDICE = "${indice}";
89      public static final String WINDOW_CHAR = "${window.char}";
90      public static final String BLOCK_MULTIBIT = "${multibit.block}";
91  
92      public static final String WINDOW = "${window}";
93  
94      public static final String CAPACITY = "${capacity}";
95      public static final String DEFAULT_CAPACITY = "65565";
96  
97      private static final String SLEEP_TIME = "${sleep_time}";
98  
99      private static final String BIT = "${bit}";
100 
101     public static final String INJECTION = "${injection}";
102 
103     public static final String TEST = "${test}";
104 
105     private static final String FILEPATH = "${filepath}";
106     private static final String FILEPATH_HEX = "${filepath.hex}";
107 
108     private static final String BODY_HEX = "${body.hex}";
109 
110     private static final String FIELDS = "${fields}";
111     private static final String FIELD = "${field.value}";
112 
113     private static final String TABLE = "${table}";
114     private static final String DATABASE = "${database}";
115 
116     private static final String TABLE_HEX = "${table.hex}";
117     private static final String DATABASE_HEX = "${database.hex}";
118     
119     private final ModelYaml modelYaml;
120     
121     private final InjectionModel injectionModel;
122     
123     public VendorYaml(String fileYaml, InjectionModel injectionModel) {
124         this.injectionModel = injectionModel;
125         var yaml = new Yaml();
126         this.modelYaml = yaml.loadAs(
127             VendorYaml.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("vendor/"+ fileYaml),
128             ModelYaml.class
129         );
130     }
131 
132     @Override
133     public String sqlDatabases() {
134         String sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getDatabase();
135         
136         if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isDiosStrategy()) {
137             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getDatabase())) {
138                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getDatabase();
139             } else {
140                 LOGGER.log(
141                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
142                     "Strategy [Dios] activated but database query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
143                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
144                 );
145             }
146         } else if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isZipStrategy()) {
147             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getDatabase())) {
148                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getDatabase();
149             } else {
150                 LOGGER.log(
151                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
152                     "Strategy [Zip] activated but database query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
153                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
154                 );
155             }
156         }
157         return sqlQuery;
158     }
159     
160     @Override
161     public String sqlTables(Database database) {
162         String sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getTable();
163         
164         if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isDiosStrategy()) {
165             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getTable())) {
166                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getTable();
167             } else {
168                 LOGGER.log(
169                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
170                     "Strategy [Dios] activated but table query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
171                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
172                 );
173             }
174         } else if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isZipStrategy()) {
175             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getTable())) {
176                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getTable();
177             } else {
178                 LOGGER.log(
179                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
180                     "Strategy [Zip] activated but table query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
181                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
182                 );
183             }
184         }
185         
186         String databaseUtf8 = Hex.encodeHexString(database.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
187         return sqlQuery
188             .replace(VendorYaml.DATABASE_HEX, databaseUtf8)
189             .replace(VendorYaml.DATABASE, database.toString());
190     }
191 
192     @Override
193     public String sqlColumns(Table table) {
194         String sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getColumn();
195         
196         if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isDiosStrategy()) {
197             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getColumn())) {
198                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getColumn();
199             } else {
200                 LOGGER.log(
201                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
202                     "Strategy [Dios] activated but column query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
203                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
204                 );
205             }
206         } else if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isZipStrategy()) {
207             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getColumn())) {
208                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getColumn();
209             } else {
210                 LOGGER.log(
211                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
212                     "Strategy [Zip] activated but column query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
213                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
214                 );
215             }
216         }
217         
218         String databaseUtf8 = Hex.encodeHexString(table.getParent().toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
219         String tableUtf8 = Hex.encodeHexString(table.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
220         
221         return sqlQuery
222             .replace(VendorYaml.DATABASE_HEX, databaseUtf8)
223             .replace(VendorYaml.TABLE_HEX, tableUtf8)
224             .replace(VendorYaml.DATABASE, table.getParent().toString())
225             .replace(VendorYaml.TABLE, table.toString());
226     }
227 
228     @Override
229     public String sqlRows(String[] namesColumns, Database database, Table table) {
230         String sqlField = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getRow().getFields().getField();
231         String sqlConcatFields = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getRow().getFields().getConcat();
232         String sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getSchema().getRow().getQuery();
233         
234         if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isDiosStrategy()) {
235             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getDatabase())) {
236                 sqlField = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getRow().getFields().getField();
237                 sqlConcatFields = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getRow().getFields().getConcat();
238                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getDios().getRow().getQuery();
239             } else {
240                 LOGGER.log(
241                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
242                     "Strategy [Dios] activated but row query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
243                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
244                 );
245             }
246         } else if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isZipStrategy()) {
247             if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getDatabase())) {
248                 sqlField = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getRow().getFields().getField();
249                 sqlConcatFields = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getRow().getFields().getConcat();
250                 sqlQuery = this.modelYaml.getResource().getZip().getRow().getQuery();
251             } else {
252                 LOGGER.log(
253                     LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_INFORM,
254                     "Strategy [Zip] activated but row query is undefined for [{}], fallback to default",
255                     () -> this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
256                 );
257             }
258         }
259         
260         var matcherSqlField = Pattern.compile("(?s)(.*)"+ Pattern.quote(VendorYaml.FIELD) +"(.*)").matcher(sqlField);
261         String leadSqlField = StringUtils.EMPTY;
262         String trailSqlField = StringUtils.EMPTY;
263         
264         if (matcherSqlField.find()) {
265             leadSqlField = matcherSqlField.group(1);
266             trailSqlField = matcherSqlField.group(2);
267         }
268         
269         var namesColumnUtf8 = new String[namesColumns.length];
270         for (var i = 0 ; i < namesColumns.length ; i++) {
271             namesColumnUtf8[i] = StringUtil.detectUtf8(namesColumns[i]);
272             namesColumnUtf8[i] = URLEncoder.encode(namesColumnUtf8[i], StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
273         }
274         
275         var nameDatabaseUtf8 = StringUtil.detectUtf8(database.toString());
276         nameDatabaseUtf8 = URLEncoder.encode(nameDatabaseUtf8, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
277         
278         var nameTableUtf8 = StringUtil.detectUtf8(table.toString());
279         nameTableUtf8 = URLEncoder.encode(nameTableUtf8, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
280         
281         return sqlQuery.replace(
282                 VendorYaml.FIELDS,
283                 leadSqlField
284                 + String.join(
285                     trailSqlField + sqlConcatFields + leadSqlField,
286                     namesColumnUtf8
287                 )
288                 + trailSqlField
289             )
290             .replace(VendorYaml.DATABASE, nameDatabaseUtf8)
291             .replace(VendorYaml.TABLE, nameTableUtf8);
292     }
293 
294     @Override
295     public String sqlFileRead(String filePath) {
296         return this.modelYaml.getResource().getFile().getRead()
297             .replace(VendorYaml.FILEPATH_HEX, Hex.encodeHexString(filePath.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)))  // MySQL
298             .replace(VendorYaml.FILEPATH, filePath);  // PostgreSQL
299     }
300 
301     @Override
302     public String sqlTextIntoFile(String body, String path) {
303         String visibleIndex = String.format(
304             VendorYaml.FORMAT_INDEX,
305             this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getSpecificNormal().getVisibleIndex()
306         );
307         return this.injectionModel.getIndexesInUrl()
308             .replaceAll(
309                 visibleIndex,
310                 this.modelYaml.getResource().getFile().getWrite()
311                 .getBody()
312                 .replace(
313                     VendorYaml.BODY_HEX,
314                     Hex.encodeHexString(body.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
315                 )
316             )
317             + StringUtils.SPACE
318             + this.modelYaml.getResource().getFile().getWrite()
319             .getPath()
320             .replace(VendorYaml.FILEPATH, path);
321     }
322 
323     @Override
324     public String sqlTestBlind(String check, BinaryMode blindMode) {
325         String replacement = this.getMode(blindMode);
326         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary()
327             .getBlind()
328             .replace(VendorYaml.BINARY_MODE, replacement)
329             .replace(VendorYaml.TEST, check)
330             .trim();  // trim spaces in '${binary.mode} ${test}' when no mode, not covered by cleanSql()
331     }
332 
333     @Override
334     public String sqlBitTestBlind(String inj, int indexCharacter, int bit, BinaryMode blindMode) {
335         String replacement = this.getMode(blindMode);
336         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary()
337             .getBlind()
338             .replace(VendorYaml.BINARY_MODE, replacement)
339             .replace(
340                 VendorYaml.TEST,
341                 this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTest().getBit()
342                 .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, inj)
343                 .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, Integer.toString(indexCharacter))
344                 .replace(VendorYaml.BIT, Integer.toString(bit))
345             )
346             .trim();  // trim spaces in '${binary.mode} ${test}' when no mode, not covered by cleanSql()
347     }
348 
349     @Override
350     public String sqlTimeTest(String check, BinaryMode blindMode) {
351         String replacement = this.getMode(blindMode);
352         int countSleepTimeStrategy = this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isLimitingSleepTimeStrategy()
353             ? this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().countSleepTimeStrategy()
354             : 5;
355         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary()
356             .getTime()
357             .replace(VendorYaml.BINARY_MODE, replacement)
358             .replace(VendorYaml.TEST, check)
359             .replace(VendorYaml.SLEEP_TIME, Long.toString(countSleepTimeStrategy))
360             .trim();  // trim spaces in '${binary.mode} ${test}' when no mode, not covered by cleanSql()
361     }
362 
363     @Override
364     public String sqlBitTestTime(String inj, int indexCharacter, int bit, BinaryMode blindMode) {
365         String replacement = this.getMode(blindMode);
366         int countSleepTimeStrategy = this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isLimitingSleepTimeStrategy()
367             ? this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().countSleepTimeStrategy()
368             : 5;
369         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary()
370             .getTime()
371             .replace(VendorYaml.BINARY_MODE, replacement)
372             .replace(
373                 VendorYaml.TEST,
374                 this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTest()
375                 .getBit()
376                 .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, inj)
377                 .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, Integer.toString(indexCharacter))
378                 .replace(VendorYaml.BIT, Integer.toString(bit))
379             )
380             .replace(VendorYaml.SLEEP_TIME, Long.toString(countSleepTimeStrategy))
381             .trim();  // trim spaces in '${binary.mode} ${test}' when no mode, not covered by cleanSql()
382     }
383 
384     private String getMode(BinaryMode blindMode) {
385         String replacement;
386         switch (blindMode) {
387             case AND: replacement = this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getModeAnd(); break;
388             case OR: replacement = this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getModeOr(); break;
389             case STACK: replacement = this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getModeStack(); break;
390             case NO_MODE:
391             default: replacement = StringUtils.EMPTY; break;
392         }
393         return replacement;
394     }
395 
396     @Override
397     public String sqlBlind(String sqlQuery, String startPosition, boolean isReport) {
398         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
399             this.getSlidingWindow(isReport)
400             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, sqlQuery)
401             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, startPosition)
402             .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, VendorYaml.DEFAULT_CAPACITY)
403         );
404     }
405 
406     @Override
407     public String sqlTime(String sqlQuery, String startPosition, boolean isReport) {
408         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
409             this.getSlidingWindow(isReport)
410             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, sqlQuery)
411             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, startPosition)
412             .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, VendorYaml.DEFAULT_CAPACITY)
413         );
414     }
415 
416     @Override
417     public String sqlMultibit(String inj, int indexCharacter, int block){
418         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getMultibit()
419             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, inj)
420             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, Integer.toString(indexCharacter))
421             .replace(VendorYaml.BLOCK_MULTIBIT, Integer.toString(block));
422     }
423 
424     @Override
425     public String sqlErrorCalibrator(Method errorMethod) {
426         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
427             errorMethod.getQuery()
428             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW, this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getSlidingWindow())
429             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getCalibrator())
430             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, "1")
431             .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, Integer.toString(errorMethod.getCapacity()))
432         );
433     }
434 
435     @Override
436     public String sqlErrorIndice(Method errorMethod) {
437         var indexZeroToFind = "0";
438         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
439             errorMethod.getQuery()
440             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW, this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getSlidingWindow())
441             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getFailsafe().replace(VendorYaml.INDICE, indexZeroToFind))
442             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, "1")
443             .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, Integer.toString(errorMethod.getCapacity()))
444         );
445     }
446 
447     @Override
448     public String sqlError(String sqlQuery, String startPosition, int indexMethodError, boolean isReport) {
449         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
450             this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getError().getMethod().get(indexMethodError).getQuery()
451             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW, this.getSlidingWindow(isReport))
452             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, sqlQuery)
453             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, startPosition)
454             .replace(
455                 VendorYaml.CAPACITY,
456                 Integer.toString(
457                     this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getError()
458                     .getMethod()
459                     .get(indexMethodError)
460                     .getCapacity()
461                 )
462             )
463         );
464     }
465 
466     @Override
467     public String sqlNormal(String sqlQuery, String startPosition, boolean isReport) {
468         return VendorYaml.replaceTags(
469             this.getSlidingWindow(isReport)
470             .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, sqlQuery)
471             .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, startPosition)
472             .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getNormal().getPerformanceLength())
473         );
474     }
475 
476     @Override
477     public String sqlStack(String sqlQuery, String startPosition, boolean isReport) {
478         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getStack().replace(
479             VendorYaml.WINDOW,
480             VendorYaml.replaceTags(
481                 this.getSlidingWindow(isReport)
482                 .replace(VendorYaml.INJECTION, sqlQuery)
483                 .replace(VendorYaml.WINDOW_CHAR, startPosition)
484                 .replace(VendorYaml.CAPACITY, VendorYaml.DEFAULT_CAPACITY)
485             )
486         );
487     }
488 
489     @Override
490     public String sqlCapacity(String[] indexes) {
491         String regexIndexes = String.join("|", indexes);
492         String regexVisibleIndexesToFind = String.format(VendorYaml.FORMAT_INDEX, "(%s)");
493         return this.injectionModel.getIndexesInUrl().replaceAll(
494             String.format(regexVisibleIndexesToFind, regexIndexes),
495             VendorYaml.replaceTags(
496                 this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getNormal().getCapacity()
497                 .replace(VendorYaml.CALIBRATOR, this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getCalibrator())
498                 .replace(VendorYaml.INDICE, "$1")
499             )
500         );
501     }
502 
503     @Override
504     public String sqlIndices(Integer nbFields) {
505         String replaceTag = StringUtils.EMPTY;
506         List<String> fields = new ArrayList<>();
507         var indice = 1;
508         for ( ; indice <= nbFields ; indice++) {
509             String field = this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getFailsafe().replace(VendorYaml.INDICE, Integer.toString(indice));
510             fields.add(field);
511             replaceTag = field;
512         }
513         indice--;
514         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getNormal()
515             .getIndices()
516             .replace(
517                 VendorYaml.INDICES,
518                 String.join(",", fields.toArray(new String[0]))
519             )
520             .replace(VendorYaml.INDICE_UNIQUE, replaceTag)
521             .replace(
522                 VendorYaml.RESULT_RANGE,
523                 String.join(",", Collections.nCopies(indice, "r"))
524             );
525     }
526 
527     @Override
528     public String sqlLimit(Integer limitSqlResult) {
529         var limitBoundary = 0;
530         try {
531             limitBoundary = Integer.parseInt(this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getLimitBoundary());
532         } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
533             LOGGER.log(LogLevelUtil.CONSOLE_ERROR, "Incorrect Limit start index, force to 0");
534         }
535         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration()
536             .getLimit()
537             .replace(VendorYaml.LIMIT_VALUE, Integer.toString(limitSqlResult + limitBoundary));
538     }
539     
540     @Override
541     public String fingerprintErrorsAsRegex() {
542         return "(?si)"+ StringUtils.join(
543             this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getFingerprint()
544             .getErrorMessage()
545             .stream()
546             .map(m -> ".*"+ m +".*")
547             .toArray(),
548             "|"
549         );
550     }
551     
552     public static String replaceTags(String sqlRequest) {
553         return sqlRequest
554             .replace("${enclose_value_sql}", VendorYaml.ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL)
555             .replace("${enclose_value_hex}", VendorYaml.ENCLOSE_VALUE_HEX)
556             .replace("${separator_qte_sql}", VendorYaml.SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL)
557             .replace("${separator_qte_hex}", VendorYaml.SEPARATOR_QTE_HEX)
558             .replace("${separator_cell_sql}", VendorYaml.SEPARATOR_CELL_SQL)
559             .replace("${separator_cell_hex}", VendorYaml.SEPARATOR_CELL_HEX)
560             .replace("${calibrator_sql}", VendorYaml.CALIBRATOR_SQL)
561             .replace("${calibrator_hex}", VendorYaml.CALIBRATOR_HEX)
562             .replace("${trail_sql}", VendorYaml.TRAIL_SQL)
563             .replace("${trail_hex}", VendorYaml.TRAIL_HEX)
564             .replace("${lead}", LEAD)
565             .replace("${lead_hex}", VendorYaml.LEAD_HEX)
566             .replace("${lead_pipe}", VendorYaml.LEAD_PIPE);
567     }
568 
569     /**
570      * Get payload with sliding window except for vulnerability report
571      */
572     private String getSlidingWindow(boolean isReport) {
573         return isReport
574             ? "(" + VendorYaml.INJECTION + ")"
575             : this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getSlidingWindow();
576     }
577     
578     
579     // Getter and setter
580 
581     @Override
582     public String sqlBinaryBlind() {
583         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getBlind();
584     }
585 
586     @Override
587     public String sqlBinaryTime() {
588         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTime();
589     }
590 
591     @Override
592     public String sqlInfos() {
593         return this.modelYaml.getResource().getInfo();
594     }
595 
596     @Override
597     public String sqlPrivilegeTest() {
598         return this.modelYaml.getResource().getFile().getPrivilege();
599     }
600 
601     @Override
602     public List<String> getFalsy() {
603         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTest().getFalsy();
604     }
605 
606     @Override
607     public List<String> getTruthy() {
608         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTest().getTruthy();
609     }
610 
611     @Override
612     public String sqlTestBinaryInitialization() {
613         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getBinary().getTest().getInitialization();
614     }
615 
616     @Override
617     public String sqlOrderBy() {
618         return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getNormal().getOrderBy();
619     }
620     
621     @Override
622     public String endingComment() {
623         if (this.injectionModel.getMediatorUtils().getPreferencesUtil().isUrlRandomSuffixDisabled()) {
624             return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getEndingComment();
625         } else {
626             return this.modelYaml.getStrategy().getConfiguration().getEndingComment()
627                 + RandomStringUtils.insecure().nextAlphanumeric(4);  // Allows binary match fingerprinting on host errors
628         }
629     }
630 
631     @Override
632     public ModelYaml getModelYaml() {
633         return this.modelYaml;
634     }
635 }
